reviews.review_msg: I recommend taking CMN courses with this professor; he was super organized during his lectures, and the weekly readings were very interesting to read, as well as the marking was pretty fair with valuable feedback.

Benjamin brought my interest back to studies because his materials are exciting to learn. The course is reading-heavy, and sometimes the test might get tricky; however, the students get to watch movies for the course. He has a fantastic sense of humour and can talk and discuss any topic for hours. It is an enjoyable class.
Super easy class with clear rubrics. Lectures are engaging and the exams were exactly what he described. Doesn't post slides but he gives plenty of time to write or take pictures.
